activities.name: Select Period Metric and Zone Code

query.value:
SELECT 
	"0CALMONTH" AS CALMONTH
   ,"YPPMETRIC" AS YPPMETRIC
   ,"0COMP_CODE__YGZONE" AS COMP_CODE__YGZONE
FROM 
   "_SYS_BIC"."system-local.bw.bw2hana/Y6FC11CP0"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$IP_CALYEAR$$','2019'))
WHERE 
   "0CALMONTH" BETWEEN 
 '@{concat(pipeline().parameters.pYearStart,pipeline().parameters.pMonthStart)}' AND '@{concat(pipeline().parameters.pYearEnd,pipeline().parameters.pMonthEnd)}' AND
"YPPMETRIC" <> 'AP07'
GROUP BY 
	"0CALMONTH"
   ,"YPPMETRIC"
   ,"0COMP_CODE__YGZONE"

	 sum("0AMOUNT") AS "0AMOUNT",
	 sum("4Y6FC11CP0_REC_COUNT") AS "4Y6FC11CP0_REC_COUNT",
	 sum("4Y6FC11CP0_TARGET_DAYS") AS "4Y6FC11CP0_TARGET_DAYS",
	 max("4Y6FC11CP0_YINV_RMWR") AS "4Y6FC11CP0_YINV_RMWR",
	 sum("4Y6FC11CP0_YRSE_WRBT") AS "4Y6FC11CP0_YRSE_WRBT",
	 sum("YIV_APST") AS "YIV_APST",
	 sum("YIV_BLKD") AS "YIV_BLKD",
	 sum("YPPMETKP") AS "YPPMETKP",
	 max("YPPTRGT") AS "YPPTRGT" 
FROM "_SYS_BIC"."system-local.bw.bw2hana/Y6FC11CP0"('PLACEHOLDER' = ('$$IP_CALYEAR$$','2019'))
WHERE "0CALMONTH" = '@{item().CALMONTH}'
  AND "YPPMETRIC" = '@{item().YPPMETRIC}'
  AND "0COMP_CODE__YGZONE" = '@{item().COMP_CODE__YGZONE}'
GROUP BY "0ACCT_TYPE",
